XenotypeDef.label: selkath
XenotypeDef.description: Selkath are a species of aquatic humanoids from the planet Manaan, they're most comfortable underwater and prefer to be immersed in liquid but those away from their homeworld don't often find themselves in a situation they can do so. Most consider the Selkath to be a peaceful and helpful people, due to their devotion to preserving their native oceans and taking care of the ill.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Selkath are a species of aquatic humanoids from the planet Manaan.

GeneDef.label: selkath head
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have the Selkath racial head type.
